# Keep Austin Beautiful â€” Zilker Park Spring Cleanup

**Saturday, March 22, 2026 | 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM**

Zilker Park, 2100 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX 78704

Join 200+ volunteers for our biggest cleanup event of the year! We'll be picking up litter along Barton Creek, removing invasive plants, and mulching trails.

## Registration

Pre-register at keepaustinbeautiful.org/zilker-spring-2026 (walk-ins welcome but supplies may be limited).

Groups of 10+ contact volunteer@keepaustinbeautiful.org for team registration.

## What to Bring
- Closed-toe shoes
- Sunscreen and hat
- Reusable water bottle

## Provided
- Gloves, trash bags, and grabbers
- Water refill stations
- Light breakfast (coffee, kolaches from Batch Kolaches)
- Community service verification letters for students

## Parking
Free parking in Zilker lot. Overflow parking at Barton Springs Pool lot (shuttle provided).

Keep Austin Beautiful has been mobilizing volunteers for environmental stewardship since 1985. Last year, our volunteers removed over 50,000 pounds of trash and invasive species from Austin waterways and parks.

keepaustinbeautiful.org | 512-391-0617
